attributionInfo.mlsDisclaimer:
IDX information is provided exclusively for personal, non-commercial use, and may not be used for any purpose other than to identify prospective properties consumers may be interested in purchasing. Information is deemed reliable but not guaranteed.

The listing broker’s offer of compensation is made only to participants of the MLS where the listing is filed.

data.description: GREAT OPPORTUNITY! Back on market through no fault of it's own! LOWEST PRICED 4 bedroom built after 2000 in all of Allen! Perfect location- just a short walk from Celebration Park with trails, playground, ponds, sports fields and tennis courts. Neighborhood pool & Curtis Middle School are just around the corner! Perfect layout w 2 living & two dining spaces, open layout with spacious family room, fabulous kitchen with huge island with seating- great for entertaining! Gas range, double ovens, stainless appliances and great natural light are just a few of the features of this lovely home. The primary bedroom is split from the secondary bedrooms and is spacious with walk in closet and nice sized bath. Enjoy time outdoors on the covered back patio, beautiful space to grab a morning coffee. Close to great shopping, dining and in the highly sought after Allen ISD! Don't miss an amazing opportunity!  Open Sunday October 29, 1-3. Come check out this jewel!
